MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Nercwys and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:17PM on 12th February 2021.
